title: When We Made Room at Our Table
subtitle: So That's What "Welcome" Means!
description:
What happens when we make room for one more?

A simple bowl of soup becomes a feast of friendship as a family invites new neighbors to share their table. Through warmth and wonder, children learn that love grows by including othersâ€”the way the Father includes everyone.

A beautiful story of generosity, belonging, and the kind of welcome that feels like home.
